Description: Cylinder seal of black steatite: perforated through the centre, bearing a roughly incised inscription. Good condition.
Curator's comments: Bibliography: P. Kaplony, 'Die Inschriften der Ägyptischen Frühzeit I (Wiesbaden, 1963), 549-50; P. Kaplony, 'Die Inschriften der Ägyptischen Frühzeit II (Wiesbaden, 1964), 1150; P. Kaplony, 'Die Inschriften der Ägyptischen Frühzeit III (Wiesbaden, 1964), pl. 100, abb. 428.
Acquisition name: Purchased through: Sir Ernest A T Wallis Budge
